channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street lamp out, 15th September
item.description:
Street lamp in need of a new bulb. Light out, makes that section of the road very dark (outside number 97 Farnaby Road)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farnaby Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pieces of furniture left on the road, 15th September
item.description:
Some very inconsiderate people left these pieces of furniture scattered all over the road. We insist on the need of CCTV being installed and fined bring imposed on the culprits.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beaconsfield Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic Light damaged, 15th September
item.description:
Police report a traffic light has been damaged and knocked over. Corner of Sevenoaks way and main road, Orpington. BR5 3JF Electrics exposed. CAD0155150925
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light number 4 not working little Russell Street, 15th September
item.description:
The street light has stopped working since yesterday (14 September) and this part of the road is now very dark. We now have individuals coming and loitering here and emptying rubbish and bags opposite and making a mess. Anti social behaviour in the dark patch is increasing... Please fix urgently
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42B, Museum Street, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Both sides of street NO LIGHTING AT ALL for lower numbers end of road. Completely dark and unsafe to walk on with dodgy paving, 15th September
item.description:
I have been away for a week so I don’t know how long they’ve been out but it’s pitch black!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Roderick Road, Gospel Oak, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previous works carried out I believe by Thames water to cover up works carried some years ago has risen up and needs urgent attention., 15th September
item.description:
The refilling of the works carried out to the entrance to my drive to cover up the hole that was dug up service pipework I believe by Thames water has now risen up on the entrance to my drive. This may have been caused to some extent by the growth of roots to my next door neighbours tree, but it is now becoming gradually more difficult to come into my drive and needs redoing to allow easy access to my property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Speldhurst Close, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New trees, 15th September
item.description:
Is it possible to get some more trees planted down Blakeney Road in the next planting season
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blakeney Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree fungus, 14th September
item.description:
I wanted to report a tree in Hoxton Square that appears to have fungal growth. This may indicate decay or structural weakness in the lower trunk. Could the tree team please inspect it to assess whether it poses any risk to the public or requires treatment?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hoxton Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping AGAIN in this location., 14th September
item.description:
Bags of trash being dumped. This has happened continuously. CCTVs should be installed to identify the dumper - it has happened multiple times in the past months

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Adolphus Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Weeds on pavements and in kerbs in Montcalm Close, 14th September
item.description:
There are street weeds growing on the pavements (near the fences) and in the kerbs in Montcalm Close. These weeds need to be sprayed with weed killer and the 'die back' removed as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montcalm Close, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Long and deep hole in road, 14th September
item.description:
There is a long and deep hole in the road as per photos which caused a car accident today. Please advise who to contact to take further. There are faint markings around it so already identified it needs filling. I have more videos and photos plus witness to accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shakespeare Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
